name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Corner - Leave Comment on Every Website

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comment on every website and follow people with the same interest

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Comment on every website and follow people with the same interest

[How to use]
1. Right click and select 'comment on corner' from the context menu to activate the side panel
2. Icon on the corner displays the number of comments if any comment exists on the page

It can be used only by installing extension
You can also visit https://corner.dance to see other pages' comments
